verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַל־ <WH5921> upon שֹׁ֭שַׁנִּים <WH7799> upon Shoshannim לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> for the sons קֹ֑רַח <WH7141> of Korah מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל <WH4905> Maschil שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> A Song יְדִידֹֽת׃ <WH3039> of loves רָ֘חַ֤שׁ <WH7370> is inditing לִבִּ֨י ׀ <WH3820> My heart דָּ֘בָ֤ר <WH1697> matter ט֗וֹב <WH2896> a good אֹמֵ֣ר <WH559> I speak אָ֭נִי <WH589> my מַעֲשַׂ֣י <WH4639> of the things which I have made לְמֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> touching the king לְ֝שׁוֹנִ֗י <WH3956> my tongue עֵ֤ט ׀ <WH5842> [is] the pen סוֹפֵ֬ר <WH5608> writer מָהִֽיר׃ <WH4106> of a ready

יָפְיָפִ֡יתָ <WH3302> Thou art fairer מִבְּנֵ֬י <WH1121> than the children אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of men ה֣וּצַק <WH3332> is poured חֵ֭ן <WH2580> grace בְּשְׂפְתוֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH8193> into thy lips עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> after that בֵּֽרַכְךָ֖ <WH1288> hath blessed אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> therefore God לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> thee for ever

חֲגֽוֹר־ <WH2296> Gird חַרְבְּךָ֣ <WH2719> thy sword עַל־ <WH5921> on יָרֵ֣ךְ <WH3409> upon [thy] thigh גִּבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> O [most] mighty ה֝וֹדְךָ֗ <WH1935> with thy glory וַהֲדָרֶֽךָ׃ <WH1926> and thy majesty

וַהֲדָ֬רְךָ֨ ׀ <WH1926> And in thy majesty צְלַ֬ח <WH6743> prosperously רְכַ֗ב <WH7392> ride עַֽל־ <WH5921> For דְּבַר־ <WH1697> because אֱ֭מֶת <WH571> of truth וְעַנְוָה־ <WH6037> and meekness צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> [and] righteousness וְתוֹרְךָ֖ <WH3384> shall teach נוֹרָא֣וֹת <WH3372> thee terrible things יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> and thy right hand

חִצֶּ֗יךָ <WH2671> Thine arrows שְׁנ֫וּנִ֥ים <WH8150> [are] sharp עַ֭מִּים <WH5971> [whereby] the people תַּחְתֶּ֣יךָ <WH8478> under יִפְּל֑וּ <WH5307> fall בְּ֝לֵ֗ב <WH3820> in the heart אוֹיְבֵ֥י <WH341> enemies הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king's

כִּסְאֲךָ֣ <WH3678> Thy throne אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God עוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [is] for ever וָעֶ֑ד <WH5703> and ever שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> the sceptre מִ֝ישֹׁ֗ר <WH4334> [is] a right שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> sceptre מַלְכוּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH4438> of thy kingdom

אָהַ֣בְתָּ <WH157> Thou lovest צֶּדֶק֮ <WH6664> righteousness וַתִּשְׂנָ֫א <WH8130> and hatest רֶ֥שַׁע <WH7562> wickedness עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֤ן ׀ <WH3651> after that מְשָׁחֲךָ֡ <WH4886> hath anointed אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> therefore God אֱ֭לֹהֶיךָ <WH430> thy God שֶׁ֥מֶן <WH8081> thee with the oil שָׂשׂ֗וֹן <WH8342> of gladness מֵֽחֲבֵרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH2270> above thy fellows

מֹר־ <WH4753> [smell] of myrrh וַאֲהָל֣וֹת <WH174> and aloes קְ֭צִיעוֹת <WH7102> [and] cassia כָּל־ <WH3605> All בִּגְדֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH899> All thy garments מִֽן־ <WH4480> at הֵ֥יכְלֵי <WH1964> palaces שֵׁ֝֗ן <WH8127> out of the ivory מִנִּ֥י <WH4482> whereby שִׂמְּחֽוּךָ׃ <WH8055> they have made thee glad

בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> daughters מְ֭לָכִים <WH4428> Kings' בְּיִקְּרוֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH3368> [were] among thy honourable women נִצְּבָ֥ה <WH5324> did stand שֵׁגַ֥ל <WH7694> the queen לִֽ֝ימִינְךָ֗ <WH3225> upon thy right hand בְּכֶ֣תֶם <WH3800> in gold אוֹפִֽיר׃ <WH211> of Ophir

שִׁמְעִי־ <WH8085> Hearken בַ֣ת <WH1323> O daughter וּ֭רְאִי <WH7200> and consider וְהַטִּ֣י <WH5186> and incline אָזְנֵ֑ךְ <WH241> thine ear וְשִׁכְחִ֥י <WH7911> forget עַ֝מֵּ֗ךְ <WH5971> also thine own people וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִֽיךְ׃ <WH1> and thy father's

וְיִתְאָ֣ו <WH183> greatly desire הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> So shall the king יָפְיֵ֑ךְ <WH3308> thy beauty כִּי־ <WH3588> Because ה֥וּא <WH1931> he thy אֲ֝דֹנַ֗יִךְ <WH113> for he [is] thy Lord וְהִשְׁתַּֽחֲוִי־ <WH7812> and worship לֽוֹ׃

וּבַֽת־ <WH1323> And the daughter צֹ֨ר ׀ <WH6865> of Tyre בְּ֭מִנְחָה <WH4503> [shall be there] with a gift פָּנַ֥יִךְ <WH6440> thy favour יְחַלּ֗וּ <WH2470> shall intreat עֲשִׁ֣ירֵי <WH6223> [even] the rich עָֽם׃ <WH5971> among the people

כָּל־ <WH3605> is all כְּבוּדָּ֣ה <WH3520> [is] all glorious בַת־ <WH1323> daughter מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> The king's פְּנִ֑ימָה <WH6441> within מִֽמִּשְׁבְּצ֖וֹת <WH4865> [is] of wrought זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold לְבוּשָֽׁהּ׃ <WH3830> her clothing

לִרְקָמוֹת֮ <WH7553> in raiment of needlework תּוּבַ֪ל <WH2986> She shall be brought לַ֫מֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king בְּתוּל֣וֹת <WH1330> the virgins אַ֭חֲרֶיהָ <WH310> that follow רֵעוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH7464> her companions מ֖וּבָא֣וֹת <WH935> her shall be brought לָֽךְ׃

תּ֭וּבַלְנָה <WH2986> shall they be brought בִּשְׂמָחֹ֣ת <WH8057> With gladness וָגִ֑יל <WH1524> and rejoicing תְּ֝בֹאֶ֗ינָה <WH935> they shall enter בְּהֵ֣יכַל <WH1964> palace מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> into the king's

תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> place אֲ֭בֹתֶיךָ <WH1> Instead of thy fathers יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become בָנֶ֑יךָ <WH1121> shall be thy children תְּשִׁיתֵ֥מוֹ <WH7896> whom thou mayest make לְ֝שָׂרִ֗ים <WH8269> princes בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in all the earth

אַזְכִּ֣ירָה <WH2142> to be remembered שִׁ֭מְךָ <WH8034> I will make thy name בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all דֹּ֣ר <WH1755> in all וָדֹ֑ר <WH1755> generations עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> after that עַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> therefore shall the people יְ֝הוֹדֻ֗ךָ <WH3034> praise לְעֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> thee for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever
